prompt: Create a sleek login form interface with a teal and white theme, emphasizing simplicity. The UI should feature a centered single-column layout with a white background (Colors.white). At the top, display a 'Sign In' heading in a bold, 32px font with a teal color (Colors.teal[700]). Below, include a subtitle 'Enter your credentials' in a 14px font with a medium teal color (Colors.teal[400]). Add two input fields: an email TextField with a rounded border (BorderRadius.circular(8)), a light teal border (Colors.teal[100]), an email icon prefix (Icons.email), a 'Email' label, and a hint text 'Your email'. The password TextField should have matching styling with a lock icon prefix (Icons.lock), a 'Password' label, a hint text 'Your password', and a visibility toggle. Both fields should use a teal focused border (Colors.teal[700]). Include a 'Forgot Password?' link aligned to the right in teal (Colors.teal[700]) with a 14px font. Add a full-width elevated button for login with a teal background (Colors.teal[700]), white text, and rounded corners (BorderRadius.circular(8)). At the bottom, include a row with 'New user?' text in medium teal followed by a 'Sign Up' link in teal. Use 24 pixels padding around the main content and 12 pixels spacing between elements. The form container should have a subtle teal shadow (BoxShadow: color Colors.teal[100], blurRadius 8). Ensure the layout is responsive with scrolling support.
